body_html:
@Sanyam2095 @songzenghui

I was getting the Makefile error 138:recipe for target "all" failed make: *** [all] Error 2

, then I tried adding those 4 lines, and now I am getting Makefile:934: error "cmake_check_build_system'
and failed.

My system is ubuntu16.04 and I tried cuDNN v6.0 (April 27, 2017), for CUDA 8.0 from here: https://developer.nvidia.com/rdp/cudnn-archive#a-collapse51b

Any resolutions yet?

Thank you,
Selin

body:
@Sanyam2095 @songzenghui 

I was getting the Makefile error 138:recipe for target "all" failed make: *** [all] Error 2
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/27472189/42549118-6a3dd44a-847f-11e8-9ad4-04f09257208c.png)
, then I tried adding those 4 lines, and now I am getting Makefile:934: error "cmake_check_build_system'
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/27472189/42549141-886c3a9c-847f-11e8-9984-b90a81a3b868.png) and failed. 

My system is ubuntu16.04 and I tried cuDNN v6.0 (April 27, 2017), for CUDA 8.0 from here: https://developer.nvidia.com/rdp/cudnn-archive#a-collapse51b 

Any resolutions yet?

Thank you,
Selin
